pages.text: The Index Card is a crucial component for networking your filing system. It links Filing Cabinets to a Filing Index, allowing you to access multiple cabinets from a single point.

pages.title: Linking Process
pages.text: To use an Index Card:$(br)$(br)1. Right-click on a Filing Index with a blank Index Card$(br)2. The card will now be linked to that Index (it will glow)$(br)3. Right-click on a Filing Cabinet with the linked card$(br)4. The Cabinet is now connected to the Index

pages.title: Technical Details
pages.text: $(li)Each Filing Index has a limited radius (8 blocks by default)$(li)Cabinets must be within range of the Index to connect$(li)Each Index has a maximum number of cabinets it can connect to (64 by default)$(li)A cabinet can only be linked to one Index at a time$(li)Breaking the Index will unlink all connected cabinets and drop the unlinked cards where the Filing Index was broken
